General.Name: Beijing Cisri Gaona Materials Tech
General.Description: Gaona Aero Material Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of high-temperature materials in China. The company offers castings, such as nickel-based alloy and light alloy investment castings; forgings comprising disks, rings, bars, forged airfoils, and alloy forgings; and powder metallurgy, including metal powders, oxide dispersion-strengthened, and near-net shape foaming products. It also provides ingots; on-shelf products, such as plate, bar, wire, strip, tube, and stellite; die steel comprising hot work die steels, hot and cold die steels, cold work die steels, and plastic die steels; and centrifugal castings, including petrochemical cracking coils, petrochemical reformer tubes, metallurgical furnace roller and tube, and glass industry roller, as well as advanced materials, such as additive manufacturing and intermetallic compound products. Its products are used in aerospace, power, petrochemical industry and other general industrial markets. The company was formerly known as Beijing Cisri-Gaona Materials & Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gaona Aero Material Co., Ltd. in January 2020. Gaona Aero Material Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Beijing, China.
